Using nasal fluid, the user creates a water source. They can manipulate the liquid at will to expand into multiple tendrils, able to ensnare or pierce a target. The water can also solidify to maintain its shape and integrity to act as a support structure.

[[fr:Arbre Muqueux]]
[[pt-br:Arte Ninja: Nariz Escorrendo]]
